page.title: 07MOTORWAY, M4
page.content: {TRANSPORT:}Open Dec. '77 built to strict{Dept. of Environment}Standards. Three lanes both directions, with slip roads making up intersection with new Cardiff Rd. extension into Talbot Green. It is mid point between Cardiff to the east and Pencoed to the west. {IMPACT:}Turned the area into commuting and residential zone within reach of Cardiff, Newport and Swansea; and has attracted much new industry such as the Royal Mint. {DESIGN:}Pre-stressed concrete arches and girders making up wide span bridges with dramatic cuttings and embankments. Already subsidence causing concern. {TRAFFIC COUNT:}Taken over 15 mins. Over 300 vehicles in each direction of which 230 were cars and 60 were H.G.V. travelling at{high}speeds in all three lanes.
